full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Reference Information

* **Reference Number**: WS3800546857-Doc3807826249
* **Tender Title (English)**: Soft Drinks for Inmate Canteen
* **Tender Title (French)**: Boissons sans alcool pour la cantine des détenus
* **Publication Date**: 30 December 2022
* **Closing Date**: 16th January 2023 at 14:00 EST

### Procurement Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3800546857
* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity**: Manitoba
* **Contract Start Date**: 1 February 2023 to 31 January 2024

### Supplier Information

* **End User Entity Name**: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
* **End User Entity Address**: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0P9, Canada
* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Havrilenko, Matthew (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: matthew.havrilenko@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Attachment**: None

### Tender Description

Canada is seeking bids from qualified suppliers to provide Correctional Service Canada with a Regional Individual Standing Offer for the supply and delivery of soft drinks to the Stony Mountain Institution Canteen in Manitoba on an as-ordered basis. The Standing Offer will be in effect from 1 February 2023 to 31 January 2024.

Only bids submitted by January 16, 2023 at 14:00 EST will be considered. Bids submitted after this deadline will be declared non-responsive.
